$description: Dark theme shadow primitives. Higher opacity than light theme for better visibility on dark backgrounds. Shadow structure matches light theme, only opacity values differ.

shadowDark.$description: Dark theme box-shadow scale. Uses higher opacity values (0.12-0.20) compared to light theme (0.04-0.10) for visibility on dark surfaces.

xs.$description: Extra small shadow (dark theme) - minimal elevation with higher opacity.

sm.$description: Small shadow (dark theme) - low elevation with higher opacity.

md.$description: Medium shadow (dark theme) - moderate elevation with higher opacity.

lg.$description: Large shadow (dark theme) - high elevation with higher opacity.

xl.$description: Extra large shadow (dark theme) - maximum elevation with higher opacity.

footer.$description: Footer shadow (dark theme) - upward-casting with higher opacity.
